nodes.text: Ickabel G'ont was a female Bith musician who played the double jocimer as part of the band Figrin D'an and the Modal Nodes. Shortly before the Battle of Yavin, G'ont and the other members of the band played at Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina on the planet Tatooine when Luke Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi visited trying to find a pilot to take them to the planet Alderaan. She eventually wrote a memoir about her time in the band, called The Lady Has a Jocimer: My Life as a Modal Node, A Memoir.
